hero.subline: Computer Science student & Competitive Programmer with strong skills in Algorithms, Data Structures, and Backend Development (.NET, ASP.NET Core). Candidate Master on Codeforces with proven ICPC results.

items.q: What are Moataz’s main areas of expertise?
items.a: Competitive Programming, Algorithms, Data Structures, and Backend Development with .NET and RESTful APIs.
Yes. He has led and taught structured DSA sessions, mentoring 500+ students via the Fayoum ICPC Community.
Candidate Master on Codeforces, 21st at AACPC 2024, 30th at ECPC 2024, and 3000+ solved problems.

footer.blurb: Empowering talent through hands-on, industry-aligned tech coaching.
